result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operate w/o Valid License (2nd w/in 3 yrs)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lloyd Albert Theodore Weller

records.addlTxt: 2:06 PM Defendant Lloyd Albert Theodore Weller not in Court.  Attorney Travis Satorius for Atty. Derek W Sanders in Court for Lloyd Albert Theodore Weller.  Assistant District Attorney Joseph M. Schieffer in Court for State of Wisconsin.  Sgt. Cole Clements in Court.  ADA Schieffer requests warrant and notes previous nonappearance.  Requests costs of $90 for witness fees noting that Sgt. Clements is not currently on duty.  Court authorizes warrant and grants costs of $90.00.

3:24 PM Lloyd Albert Theodore Weller appears in custody from Jail via video,  Atty Liesl E. Nelson by phone, DA Halle Hatch appears in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court questions non-appearance, Defendant responds. DA Hatch has no objection to the warrant being quashed and bond reinstated but will ask for cash if a hearing is missed again. Court will quash the warrant and reinstate the bond. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:29 pm.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on October 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Lloyd Albert Theodore Weller

Prior: 8410 Hwy 19 Blvd, Cannon Falls, MN 55009
Extradite Adj. States      JRG signed 8/30/22 - E: DA, Atty & Email: Jail & Dispatch. eif

10:05 AM Defendant Lloyd Albert Theodore Weller not in Court.  Attorney Derek W Sanders in Court for Lloyd Albert Theodore Weller.  ADA Joseph M. Schieffer in court for State of Wisconsin.  ADA Schieffer notes Defendant was present when hearing was set and Deputy Sgt. is here prepared to testify.  Based upon nonappearance State requests warrant, body only.  Adjoining States.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on August 30, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Court finds Defendant freely, intelligently, knowingly, and understandingly made and waives constitutional right to those time requirements.
records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
Maintain absolute sobriety.
Not to possess controlled substances without a valid prescription.

3:23 PM Defendant Lloyd Albert Theodore Weller appears in custody from Jail via video, Atty K. Dippalito appears by phone, ADA Joseph M. Schieffer appears for the State of Wisconsin. DE does qualify for PD.  Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and constitutional rights. Defendant understands charges, possible penalties and constitutional rights. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. ADA Schieffer is requesting a $5,000.00 SIBS w/conditions of absolute sobriety & Not to possess controlled subst., no objection. Court so orders. Waive the time limits. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:32 pm.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 10:00 am.
